description: The planner requests a rain‑check notification for an outdoor wedding, and the assistant uses the send_email tool to notify all guests with the new venue and time details.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, retrieve vendor offers, manage RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Use the appropriate tools to fulfill user requests and always confirm actions with the user.

We have an outdoor wedding scheduled for June 15 at Lakeside Garden, but the forecast predicts rain. Please send a rain‑check email to all the guests with the new indoor backup venue (Grand Hall) and change the start time to 4 PM. Include a brief apology and a note that the rest of the schedule stays the same.
Got it! I’ll draft an email informing all attendees about the rain‑check, the new venue (Grand Hall), and the updated start time of 4 PM. I’ll then send it to everyone on the RSVP list.

arguments.subject: Rain‑Check Notice: Wedding on June 15 – New Venue & Time
arguments.body:
Dear Guest,

We hope you’re as excited as we are for the upcoming wedding on June 15. Unfortunately, the forecast predicts rain for the day, so we’ve arranged a rain‑check plan to ensure everyone stays comfortable.

New Details:

  • Venue: Grand Hall (indoor)
  • Start Time: 4 PM (the rest of the schedule remains unchanged)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Looking forward to celebrating with you!

Best regards,
The Wedding Planning Team
